Name: Screaming Banana Banshee
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
30 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass .
Prepare garnish of banana chunk on rim.
BLEND all ingredients with 7oz scoop of crushed ice.
Review: An alcoholic banana and chocolate milkshake - not too sweet.
History: Without the vodka, this is a plain Banana Banshee.
